code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{AppContext}from'../context/AppContext';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Remaining=()=>{const{expenses,budget,currency}=useContext(AppContext);const totalExpenses=expenses.reduce((total,item)=>{return total=total+item.cost;},0);const alertType=totalExpenses>budget?'alert-danger':'alert-success';return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"alert ".concat(alertType),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Remaining: ",currency,budget-totalExpenses]})});};export default Remaining;
